title: Hike in the Canale di Pirro Valley
shortDescription: Discover the scenic Canale di Pirro with a guided hike
description: Join us for an invigorating hike through the Canale di Pirro valley, a unique natural depression in the heart of Puglia. Surrounded by hills and vineyards, the trail offers panoramic views and hidden gems of biodiversity. Ideal for nature lovers and photography enthusiasts.

host.name: Marco P.
host.description: Hiking guide and environmentalist with a deep love for the Canale di Pirro area.
